data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: A system message appears telling you that the channel order was updated
data.expected_result: A system message appears telling you that the category order was updated
data.short_description: "Channel order updated." system message appears instead of "Category order updated." when sorting categories
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new and fresh server - Create a few channels and categories - Go to server settings - Go to channels section - Go into the category sorting mode - Change the order of one or more categories
